page.title: 04CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: One class made a survey of games which their parents played.Their favourite game was Tig.Bottisham Primary School found that this is still the most popular game today.It was compared with ninety_five other games. Stuck In The Mud_First you choose someone to be It.The person who is It has to catch you.When you have been caught you have to stand with your legs apart until someone crawls through your legs.The winner is either the person that's It and has everyone stuck in the mud or when you can't be caught. Jacks_You've got six stones on the ground and a rubber ball,Throw the ball up in the air,let it bounce,pick up a stone,catch the ball in the hand with the stone in.Next time you pick up two stones.Continue until six are picked up.
